boardgame.name: Super Dungeon Explore
boardgame.description: Super Dungeon Explore (SDE) is a dungeon crawler inspired by old Japanese console RPGs. The 52 included miniatures are done in a cute / chibi / super-deformed style, which means the head is roughly the same size as the rest of the body._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;One to five players take the role of classic fantasy heroes like the human paladin, a dwarf fighter, or an elf ranger. One player is the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Dark Consul_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; who controls the monsters of the dungeon. Every hero/monster has a character card that details the stats for movement, attack, armor, willpower, dexterity, action points and hearts (= life points). Additional information may include special abilities / actions / attacks and potions._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game is played on modular dungeon boards. During a round of play, the game passes back and forth between single heroes and the monsters, but the exact order may change from round to round. The characters use the stats from their character card, special dice (with hearts, potions and stars) are only used for combat and checks. If the heroes wound the opponent, they may draw loot cards to improve their stats. There is also the possibility to open treasure chests to find even more powerful things. The monsters have no possibility to _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;level up_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; apart from a single late game upgrade but the Dark Consul has an unlimited number of them._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;To win the game, the Dark Consul must defeat all heroes in his dungeon. The heroes must spawn the dungeon boss by killing monsters or destroying all spawning points (= entry points for new monsters). The heroes must then kill the dungeon boss to be victorious._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Cool Mini Or Not (CMN BG01) ARCADE BATTLES ON YOUR TABLETOP! -Insert Coin- Super Dungeon Explore is an expandable strategy board game for 2 or more players, combining the fun of traditional dungeon crawls, with a unique retro arcade/vivdeo game feel, featuring authentic CHIBI anime heroes battling hordes of minions and huge monsters in a dungeon full of traps and treasure.
Bring Video Game Nostalgia to your Table Top! Directed and designed to be an homage to classic console and arcade games, and brought to life by the world class Soda Pop Minaitures design studio, Super Dungeon Explore is going to wow customerswith the quality of its components, and the versatility and replayability of its game mechanics. Easy to learn, difficult to master, this is truly a fast paced tabletop strategy game.

I just don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t have time to paint the minis so I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve decided to sell my S.D.E. All minis are assembled (except for a couple tiny pieces). Heroes are primed with gray primer, monsters are not primed. Two of the heroes are fully painted to a good standard, but not seal coated. Cards are still factory sealed, dice were never used, counters un-punched, game was never played. I will wrap the minis separately to minimize the risk of damage. Be aware however that some pieces may need to be re-glued no matter how well it is packed, these are plastic minis afterall. Will only charge actual shipping cost but be aware that this will weigh around 6 lbs when packed for shipping...Parcel post woulod be around $14, priority to East coast probably around $20 West coast $30.

new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; sealed.
buyer pays paypal fees, if any.

I bought it, assembled it, painted it, bagged it, but no one wanted to play it. Sad. I have done a black wash/dry brush painting technique. All the heroes are a solid light blue color with black wash. 100% complete except for the plastic box insert. After assembly, I could not get the insert AND the figures back in the box. Again, LIKE NEW and complete. Bonus! Comes with Candy _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Cola expansion figure and card. United States shipping only. Paypal and Money Order OK. 20.00 flat shipping-Insurance included.

new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; sealed.

Only played twice. All assembled. Boards in excellent shape. 2 quirks in assembly though: 1)a figurine standing on its tail broke and I had to reglue it. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s sturdy now (see photo 1). 2)The large dragon_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s feet got glued on a touch out of the grove and so it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a little off center (see photo 2). Overall, still in great shape. All other minis great(see photo 3). USPS shipping $11.35

This game has been played a couple of times and is in excellent condition. The box has a little shelf wear but that is based on the quality of the box which is poor. All minis are assembled. Includes promo mini Candy and Cola I will ship via UPS, USPS or Fed Ex at my discretion. Shipping is $15.

All game pieces should be there. I got it in a trade so I never verified. The cards have all been sleeved and the tokens are in a baggie. The figures are all assembled and glued. All are in good condition except that the wing for the dragon fell off when it was shipped to me and needs to be reattached. Other than that, all is good.

Cool Mini Or Not (CMNBG01) Super Dungeon Explore, the world_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s first chibi anime strategy battle game is ready from Soda Pop Miniatures! Go head-to-head with your party of brave adventurers, or play as the dungeons evil master summoning hordes of minions to battle over who will rule the underworld of Crystalia. This game box comes complete with over 50 finely crafted Soda Pop miniatures, full rules, cards, dice, and battle maps to start playing your games of Super Dungeon Explore!
This is for Kweku Abraham.

New in shrink wrap. Canadians will be charge applicable taxes. Orders will be processed the same day and shipped by expedited parcel. You will be charged exact shipping plus $2 for packing material. Shipped from N2B 1J4. Local pickups welcome. We ship worldwide. Orders may be combined and orders over $150 will be shipped in Canada free or in the US for a $10 flat fee. Orders must be placed at the same time. We ship the day we receive payment!!! We will reduce shipping cost on international orders by $10 if the order is over $150. We currently only accept PayPal. Our prices are always 30% or more off US MRSP.

I looked over the game to make sure all the pieces were still in the box since I haven_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t played it in so long. Every card, game board, rule book, miniature, and all dice are accounted for, not to mention the large number of tokens in the game. I found nothing damaged and all cards are still sharp. Included in this sale is: -Super Dungeon Explore Core Game - 53 minis (9 heroes, boss, 2 minibosses, 5 spawn points, 16 dice, lots of cards, and more) -Caverns of Roxor Expansion - 31 minis (3 heroes, boss, miniboss, fireflow denizens and rock top minions, plus 6 treasures) -Von Drakk Manor Expansion - 34 minis (3 heroes, boss, miniboss, undead denizens and minions, plus 6 treasures) The core game has been played twice, Caverns of Roxor has been played once, and Von Drakk Manor has never been played. All miniatures, cards, tokens, dice, and game box are in factory condition (some still remain unpunched, and some cards are still shrink wrapped). This game has been properly stored in a child-free, pet-free and smoke-free home. I no longer have the time to play unfortunately, so I decided to put the game and expansions up for sale. Some of the figures have been painted by myself. While I am not a professional, I have taken my time and the quality is evident. All components are accounted for and all miniatures have been fully assembled with the exception of the dragon boss_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s wings (to allow for easy storage). Due to the large number of figures and included components this is a relatively heavy shipment. Shipping and handling will cost $20.00 and will be shipped out within 24 hours after confirmation of payment. Additionally, a tracking number will be provided once the package has been shipped. If you have any additional questions feel free to send me a message via BGG. I also offer free pickup if buyer is located in Rochester, NY.
